name: Riffs on the Reef
description:
Squidmon Cowell’s annual competition is here again! Perform to prove you’re the one that can put the motion in the ocean and the wriggle in the reef! Make some waves with your tunes to earn the grand prize hidden within the Chest of Unforeseen Fortunes!

Show the crowd of crustaceans that your beats are the best. Make the coral clap to your musical melodies. Bring out the best of the reef in this rhythmic seascape full of luscious life, vibrant visuals, and marvellous music! Follow the rhythm of the sea and unleash your inner song in a grand finale!

Riffs on the Reef is an audio-visual treat for everyone with a song in their heart and a rhythm in their feet.

A Chair Too Few! Yasmin Amir Hamzah
